author: potuz
content: I don't think we will have this meeting, there's no new events and we're all focused on Fusaka devnet 1. With Teku we seemed to have agreed that it doesn't make sense for us to continue advancing until other clients have at least shown some advance in implementation. Our implementation is full featured and there are only minor changes to the spec that are needed

author: potuz
content: I think the breakouts can be cancelled until either other clients join or the EIP is CFId

content: The meeting has been removed from the calendar. As per the new GitHub bot setup, it will be automatically added back once an agenda is created.
